title: Twitter Still Reads Like a Blind Retweet
sub_head: Twitter has a new face, but its new content isn’t fresh enough
body:
Try to retweet a story without clicking on it and Twitter will somewhat superciliously ask you if you’d like to read it first. Right about now, the platform could use one of its own reminders.
The social networking company put forth several lofty goals a year ago. By the end of 2023, it said it would work to at least double its revenue, reach at least 315 million monetizable daily active users and rapidly accelerate the pace of features it released.
